parameters.description: The version of the API to use
parameters.name: Anytype-Version

parameters.description: The ID of the space to delete the tag from; must be retrieved from ListSpaces endpoint
parameters.name: space_id

parameters.description: The ID of the property to delete the tag for; must be retrieved from ListProperties endpoint or obtained from response context
parameters.name: property_id

parameters.description: The ID of the tag to delete; must be retrieved from ListTags endpoint or obtained from response context
parameters.name: tag_id
